<acr1:CurrencyCode>${CurrencyCode}</acr1:CurrencyCode>\r <acr1:CustomerBillingAddress>${CustomerAddress}</acr1:CustomerBillingAddress>\r <acr1:CustomerCity xsi:nil="true"/>\r
